title: Carmageddon.Reincarnation.With.HD.Update.v1.2.0.7673-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Carmageddon.Reincarnation-KaOs ]-
                                                             
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                       
                                                             
Release/Size:-------------[ 5.80GIG ]                        
                                                             
Release/Date:-------------[ 04-11-15 ]-                      
                                                             
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                      
                                                             
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Codex ]-                         
                                                             
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-                       
                                                             
Movie/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                     
                                                             
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Untouched ]-                     
                                                             
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-                     
                                                             
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ Estimated 42GIG Free ]-          
                                                             
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 11.5GIG ]-                       
                                                             
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-                  



 Step-1:-------[ Unrar Using Latest Winrar Or Equivilant ]-     
                                                                
 Step-2:-------[ Click Install.exe                              
                 Select Install Location And Wait For The       
                 Game Data To Be Extracted/Rebuilt ]-           
                                                                
 Step-3:-------[ Click Carmageddon_Reincarnation.exe To Play    
                 Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcut ]-         
                                                                
 Depending On The Release One Or More Command Windows May Open  
 They Must Be Allowed To Finish And Should Not Be Closed Until  
 Otherwise Prompted.                                            
                                                                
                                                                
                                                                
 Estimated Install Time:- 30Mins On A SSD            8 Cores [*]
                                                     4 Cores [ ]
                                                                
                                                                
 Notes:                                                         
                                                                
 Carmageddon Reincarnation Update v1 2 0 7673-BAT Is Included.  
                                                                
 This update is major improvement to the game, enabling         
 it to be played in HD where it previously couldn't             
 and making it playable for the first time for some.            
                                                                
 We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe  
 Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Certain 
 Games During Rebuild.                                          
 Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe
 Creates Is C:/Games/                                           
 This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                       
                                                                
 -> If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone <-        
 This Is Caused By Temp Files Been Created Or Relocated         
 And Can Take Alot Of Time Depending On The Size Of The Game.   
                                                                
 Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.         
 (So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)             
                                                                
                                                                
 Group Notes:                                                   
                                                                
 Due To The Sheer Size Of Games Now We Have Been Forced To      
 Semi Retire Our Beloved Install.exe                            
 The New Upgraded Version Is Still A Rushed Early Release But We
 Have High Hopes For Its Future :)
